app.title: Hubble
app.desc: Hubble is a resource sharing application for IITR junta. We log the links posted by users along with their active interaction in the form of clicks, votes and comments

fields.name: id
fields.desc: integer to identify a unique link

fields.name: track
fields.desc: track in which link was posted

fields.name: title
fields.desc: title of the resource in the link

fields.name: timestamp
fields.desc: unix timestamp when link was posted

fields.name: uid
fields.desc: integer to identify the unique user who posted the link

fields.name: item
fields.desc: integer to identify the unique voted link

fields.name: user
fields.desc: username of the user who has voted

fields.name: item
fields.desc: integer to identify the unique clicked link

fields.name: user
fields.desc: username of the user who has clicked
